did.head: Descriptive Summary
did.repository: Special Collections, University of Virginia Library

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: Student Council Office Administrative Files, Accession #RG-23/2/4/.971, Special Collections, University of Virginia Library, Charlottesville, Va.

acqinfo.head: Acquisition Information
acqinfo.p: This collection was transferred by Pat Payne, Student Council's Office, Newcomb Hall, University of Virginia on 1997 September 26.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Content Information
scopecontent.p: The papers consist of topical files of the president of the Student Council.

did.unittitle: American Association of University Student (AAUS) (2 Folders) 1987-1988
Directory of International Students, Faculty and Scholars 1984-1987
Drug Free Schools and Campuses Task Force 1988-1990
Freedom of Information Act Virginia Code 2.1-343, 344, 345 1987-1988
State Council for Higher Education of Virginia (SCHEV) 1988-1991

Thomas Jefferson Teaching Award and Teaching Awards Committee 1988-1990
